text.sentence: Hey Sujatha, hows everything?
No updates?
Anyways, was looking at Dr. Mitra's profile at rate my professor and enjoyed what students have written there :P
http://www.ratemyprofessors.com/ShowRatings.jsp?tid=403804
Some gems:
* So conceited - hard to rationally argue with him about anything.
* Whenever any critique is made of his teaching style, he defends himself obsessively and refuses to listen.
He is childish and unintelligent.
* King of the eternal PPT (75-150 slides). Doesn't create them...borrows PPT's from other teachers from other universities (retarded).
* Basically...he says that a lot.
* poorly organized, no experience in the field that he was teaching
* he has no clue what hes talking about when hes lecuring, and it is obvious to everyone in the class
* The class involves him reading off slides or doing random/pointless problems.
Just replace teaching by research and it will look as if these comments were posted by us :( :)
Cc: sujatha.das@gmail.com
True it is.
In fact, many times I wanted to open a site
http://ratemyadvisor.com
But then I found out that there are already many out there, where you can rant anonymously with your heart's content:
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&source=hp&q=rant+your+boss&rlz=1R2GGLL_en&aq=f&aqi=&aql=&oq=&gs_rfai=
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&rlz=1R2GGLL_en&q=i+hate+my+boss&aq=f&aqi=g-c1g2g-c1g1g-c5&aql=&oq=&gs_rfai=
etc etc.
The principal one is, of course,
http://www.workrant.com/
Cc: s <s@email.com>
LOL! Good find Sumit.
These undergrads are really cool or what.
Sometime you have to admire their brashness.
Nice to hear from you, everything is as usual :).
The weather sucks, I am growing fatter and older and my research is suffering!
What about you?? I really feel bad that I cannot do linear algebra and learning theory courses this semester.
I have big time crushes on both these subjects, not to mention I am extremely fond of both the professors :P.
Joined NEC labs last week.
My chinky mentor is a total nerd and she is currently busy with some deadlines.
Gave me a lot of code+papers to read and said she will hound me from mid next week.
So nothing significant to update yet.
Sometime we should harass Mike and get a ride from him to NJ.
You will find amazing Indian stores here where for a moment you would imagine you are grocery shopping in India!
Just got a big bag of chakli and am gorging on them :P
